clause
  phrase function=Subj
  /without/
  <: phrase function=Pred
  /-/
    phrase_atom rela#Appo|Para|Spec
      word pdp=subs|nmpr|prps|prde|prin|adjv
  << phrase function=PreC
  /without/
  :> phrase function=Pred
  /-/
  /without/
    word pdp=prep
  /-/
    word pdp=subs|nmpr|prin|adjv ls=card|ordn
